scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require('husky').install() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }"
scripts.infra:synth: cd infra && npx cdk synth --profile myg
scripts.infra:synth:shared: cd infra && npx cdk synth SharedInfraStack --profile myg
scripts.infra:synth:yoga-go: cd infra && npx cdk synth YogaGoStack --profile myg
scripts.infra:synth:app-two: cd infra && npx cdk synth AppTwoStack --profile myg
scripts.infra:deploy:shared: cd infra && npx cdk deploy SharedInfraStack --profile myg
scripts.infra:deploy:yoga-go: cd infra && npx cdk deploy YogaGoStack --profile myg
scripts.infra:deploy:app-two: cd infra && npx cdk deploy AppTwoStack --profile myg
scripts.infra:diff: cd infra && npx cdk diff --profile myg
scripts.infra:destroy: cd infra && npx cdk destroy --profile myg
